publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3476 Brian Adam: Dyce Academy Aberdeen Charitable Award—That the Parliament congratulates the pupils of Dyce Academy, Aberdeen, on their recent success at the Giving Nation awards ceremony where for the second year running they won a national award for their tireless charity work. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S2M-3476 Brian Adam: Dyce Academy Aberdeen Charitable Award—That the Parliament congratulates the pupils of Dyce Academy, Aberdeen, on their recent success at the Giving Nation awards ceremony where for the second year running they won a national award for their tireless charity work. Supported by: Alex Johnstone*, Ms Sandra White*, Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-3476 Dyce Academy Aberdeen Charitable Award (lodged on 27 October 2005) Shiona Baird*, Mr David Davidson*, Robin Harper*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-3476 Dyce Academy Aberdeen Charitable Award (lodged on 27 October 2005) Mr John Swinney*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Richard Lochhead*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-3476 Dyce Academy Aberdeen Charitable Award (lodged on 27 October 2005) Fiona Hyslop*
